#summary Howto use AVR-drv

= Howto use AVR-drv =

It is simple to use AVR-drv in your project.
  * Download AVR-drv and place in, as example, c:\AVR-drv
  * Add "AVR_DRV_DIR = c:/AVR-drv" at top of your Makefile
  * Add "$(AVR_DRV_DIR)/avr-drv.c" to your source list in your Makefile
  * Add "$(AVR_DRV_DIR)" to the EXTRAINCDIRS variable in your Makefile
  * Create a file name "avr-drv-conf.h", see example for samples

Voil√†, your done. Now simply make some code that use AVR-drv.
